title: Allow developers to set AutomationId on CoreWindows and MessageDialog in UWP apps
body: When developing Coded UI test for a localized UWP apps, test becomes dependent on texts that are localized. On most controls this can easily be handled by an AutomationId, but on the CoreWindow and MessageBox (incl. buttons) you cannot set any AutomationIdâ€™s so the coded UI test has the use the title to find the elements.
